body:
Judging from the output of your ls, your GOROOT is only writable by root, and assuming you are running gomobile init as someone other than root, it means GOROOT is not writable.

The error has changed significantly int the current version of gomobile, as now the only time it writes to the GOROOT is with go install std, so the error you get now is from the Go tool. But ultimately you will need your GOROOT to be writable by gomobile init.
